meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>eye</radical> gets kicked with a <radical>cleat</radical> that came careening toward your <radical>forehead</radical> when it popped off someone doing a <radical>dance</radical>, and you <kanji>blink</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>blink</kanji> and blink and <reading>soon</reading> (しゅん) there are tears coming out of them too. You try to blink them away but it's not working. Soon you're crying and blinking and crying some more.
